data.title: EEA-ESEM Congress 2023
data.meta_description: EEA Scientific Committee Programme Chairs Sule Alan (European University Institute) and Francesco Decarolis (Bocconi University, Milan)
data.text:
EEA Scientific Committee

Programme Chairs

Sule Alan (European University Institute) and Francesco Decarolis (Bocconi University, Milan)

Field Coordinators and Graders:

Applied Macroeconometrics

Lead: Michele Lenza, ECB

Graders: Luca Gambetti, Michele Modugno, Francesca Monti

Applied Microeconomics

Leads: Arnaud Chevalier, University of Reading, N. Meltem Daysal, University of Copenhagen, Martin O’Connell, University of Wisconsin-Madison, and Christopher Rauh, University of Cambridge

Graders: Alison Andrew, Manuel Bagues, Simone Bertoli, Barbara Biasi, Ian Burn, Anna Piil Damm, Ben Elsner, Gabrielle Fack, Mery Ferrando, Hanno Foerster, Rita Ginja, Marta Golin, Libertad Gonzalez, Nagore Iriberri, Agnes Kovacs, Petter Lundborg, Héctor Pifarré i Arolas, Pia Pinger, Birgitta Rabe, Nuria Rodriguez-Planas, David Sturrock, Stephanie von Hinke, Dinand Webbink, Miriam Wüst, Weilong Zhang, Natalia Zinovyeva

Behavioural and Experimental Economics

Leads: Elif Kubilay, University of Essex, and Arthur Schram, University of Amsterdam

Graders: Jordi Brandts, Luigi Butera, Jonathan de Quidt, Taisuke Imai, Suanna Oh, Eva Raiber, Christina Rott, Giorgia Romagnoli, Dennie Van Dolder, Matthias Weber

Development

Lead: Abhijeet Singh, Stockholm School of Economics, and Gabriel Ulyssea, University College London

Graders: Alison Andrew, Alexia Delfino, Stefano Fiorin, Lucie Gadenne, Nicola Limodio, Kristina Manysheva, Ursula Mello, Niclas Moneke, Simon Quinn, Oliver Vanden Eynde

Econometrics

Lead: Raffaella Giacomini, University College London and Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago

Graders: Daniele Bianchi, Arturas Juodis, Sebastien Laurent, Laura Liu

Economic History

Lead: Yanos Zylberberg, University of Bristol

Graders: Jeanet Bentzen, Elena Esposito, Eric Monnet

Economic Theory

Lead: Antonio Penta, Universitat Pompeu Fabra

Graders: Sarah Auster, Alexander Frug, Emre Ozdenoren, Eduardo Perez, Luciano Pomatto, Alexander Teytelboym

Environmental Economics

Lead: Matti Liski, Aalto University

Graders: Reyer Gerlagh, John Hassler, David Hemous, Ralf Martin, Katheline Schubert, Nicolas Treich, Ulrich Wagner

Finance

Leads: Frederico Belo, INSEAD, and Andreas Fuster, Swiss Finance Institute

Graders: Toni Ahnert, Tania Babina, Francesco Celentano, Matthieu Chavaz, Yao Deng, Thomas Geelen, Sergei Glebkin, Marco Grotteria, Christoph Herpfer, Christian Jensen, Yigitcan Karabulut, Howard Kung, Nicola Limodio, Pierre Mabille, Tatyana Marchuk, Roberto Marfe, Juliana Salomao, Eva Schliephake, Daniel Streitz, Andrea Vedolin

Industrial Organisation

Lead: Giulia Brancaccio, NYU Stern School of Business

Graders: Milena Almagro, Estelle Cantillon, Giovanni Compiani, Laura Grigolon, Natalia Fabra, Sebastian Fleitas, Lorenzo Magnolfi, Mathias Reynaert, Milena Wittwer

International

Leads: Luca Fornaro, CREI, UPF and BSE, and Federica Romei, University of Oxford

Graders: Esther Boler, Ambrogio Cesa-Bianchi, Sergio de Ferra, Sebastian Fanelli, Carlo Galli, Fadi Hassan, Dmitry Mukhin, Evgenia Passari, Anna Rogantini Picco, Hernan Seoane, Daniele Siena, Vania Stavrakeva, Martin Wolf, Emircan Yurdagul

Labour

Leads: Alexia Delfino, Bocconi University, and Thomas Le Barbanchon, Bocconi University

Graders: Massimo Anelli, Anne Ardila Brenoe, Giulia Giupponi, Joseph-Simon Goerlach, Franck Malherbet, Michele Pellizzari, Suphanit Piyapromdee, Erik Plug, Roland Rathelot, Anna Raute, David Seim, Daphné Skandalis, Ulf Zoelitz

Law and Economics

Lead: Matthieu Chemin, McGill University

Graders: Elliott Ash and Emeric Henry

Macroeconomics

Leads: Florin Bilbiie, University of Cambridge, Edouard Challe, EUI, Vincent Sterk, UCL, and Liliana Varela, LSE

Graders: Vladimir Asriyan, Isaac Baley, Juliane Begenau, Corina Boar, Benjamin Born, Tobias Broer, Fernando Broner, Fabrice Collard, Jeanne Commault, Wei Cui, Maarten De Ridder, Keshav Dogra, Thomas Drechsel, Ester Faia, Elisa Faraglia, Axelle Ferriere, Francesco Furlanetto, Gaetano Gaballo, Chryssi Giannitsarou, Marcus Hagedorn, Luigi Iovino, Peter Karadi, Moritz Kuhn, Kieran Larkin, Ralph Lütticke, Joseba Martinez, Sara Moreira, Gernot Mueller, David Krisztian Nagy, Evi Pappa, Cameron Peng, Facundo Piguillem, Xavier Ragot, Giovanni Ricco, Dmitriy Sergeyev, Victoria Vanasco

Political Economy

Lead: Laurent Bouton, Georgetown University

Graders: Filipe Campante, Micael Castanheira, Garance Genicot, Gabriele Gratton, Ethan Kaplan, Aniol Llorente-Saguer, Allison Stashko, Dimitrios Xefteris, Jan Zapal

Public
